original: Erikson, Sven Gustav Adolf, kommunalläkare, Reftele, f. 15/10/97 i Hjo av käillarmäst. Adolf E. o. Helga Andersson. G. 26 m. Karin Tyrén. Barn: Inger f. 29, Barbro 31, Kerstin 32. — Stud:ex. i Skövde 17, med. kand. 21 o. med. lic. 27 i Sthlm. Tf. und :läk. v. Mössebergs vintersan. o. Broby san. 25, v. Sundsvalls san. 26, e. o. aman. v. Karol. inst. patolog, inst. 26-27, assist :läk. v. Sundsvalls las. kir. avd. 27-28, -andre o. förste und :läk. där 28-30, därunder vik. överläk. 29, förste und :iläk. å örnskölds viks las. kir. avd. 30-32, därav två mån. å med. avd. ■samt vik. överläk. å kir. avd. 30 o. 31, div. prov:’l’äk :förordn. i Långshyttans, Skellefteå o. Sollefteå distr. 32-33, i Burträsks’ o. Norbergs distr. 34, tf. stadsläk. i Hjo 34, komm :läk. i Reftele sed. 35.
translated: Erikson, Sven Gustav Adolf, municipal physician, Reftele, born on October 15, 1897 in Hjo to tavern master Adolf E. and Helga Andersson. Married Karin Tyrén in 1926. Children: Inger born in 1929, Barbro in 1931, Kerstin in 1932. He completed his secondary school education in Skövde in 1917, earned his Bachelor of Medicine degree in 1921, and his medical license in 1927, both in Stockholm. He was substitute and deputy physician at Mössebergs Vintersanatorium and Broby Sanatorium in 1925, at Sundsvalls Sanatorium in 1926, and at the Karolinska Institute's Pathology Institute and Surgical Clinic in 1926-1927. He was assistant physician at Sundsvalls Hospital's surgical department in 1927-1928, and deputy and chief deputy physician there from 1928-1930, when he served as acting chief physician for two months. He was chief deputy physician at Örnsköldsvik Hospital's surgical department in 1930-1932, including two months in the medical department, and acting chief physician for the surgical department in 1930 and 1931. He was appointed various acting medical examiner positions in the Långshyttan, Skellefteå, and Sollefteå districts in 1932-1933, in the Burträsk and Norberg districts in 1934, temporary city physician in Hjo in 1934, and municipal physician in Reftele since 1935.
